senses.de: To cease operations or stop functioning, especially in a business or machine context.
senses.ex: The company had to shut down temporarily due to maintenance issues.
senses.use: Used to indicate stopping or halting an activity, often temporarily or due to external factors.
senses.re: related to stopping processes or services
senses.tp: common in business and technical contexts

Tips.title: Business context
Tips.description: Used commonly in the context of businesses ceasing operations.
Tips.example: The restaurant decided to shut down due to high overhead costs.

Elementary.wordDefinition: Close down can also mean to stop operations but is used more frequently with businesses that are shutting permanently.
